citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 p.m. on
12/11/2015. Spoke with the owner's wife via phone who indicated they were not available to facilitate an inspection
due to prior commitments.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 p.m. on
12/11/2015.  Spoke with the owner's wife via phone who indicated they were not available to facilitate an inspection
due to prior commitments.
